name: BOARD OF PENSIONS OF EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH IN AMERICA, dba Portico Benefit Services, petitioner, v. David BACON, et al.
name_abbreviation: Bd. of Pensions of Evangelical Lutheran Church in Am. v. Bacon

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
BOARD OF PENSIONS OF EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH IN AMERICA, dba Portico Benefit Services, petitioner,
v.
David BACON, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Alliance Defending Freedom for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Minnesota denied.
casebody.head_matter:
BOARD OF PENSIONS OF EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH IN AMERICA, dba Portico Benefit Services, petitioner,
v.
David BACON, et al.
No. 16-910.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 27, 2017.
Motion of Alliance Defending Freedom for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Minnesota denied.
